nodes.bodyText: Do you think it's worth it to just have this take a HeaderValidationMode instead of the boolean? Same number of args but with a lot more flexibility.

The boolean means different things to three different validation steps.  You will note once I skip detached rules, and another time I only do detached rules, and yet another place I do fill or none.  So it would then become three args, of which they should only be passed in two coordinated sets (DETACHED_ONLY/SKIP_DETATCHED/FULL and LIGHT_DETACHED_ONLY/LIGHT_SKIP_DETATCHED/LIGHT).  No need to bring that complexity into the function call.
